detectors.description:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in CurveProtocol.sell(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectCurveThreePool.sol#334-364):
	External calls:
	- _sellAmt = getUint(getId,sellAmt) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectCurveThreePool.sol#342)
		- returnVal = MemoryInterface(getMemoryAddr()).getUint(getId) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectCurveThreePool.sol#49)
	- _sellToken.approve(address(curve),_sellAmt) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectCurveThreePool.sol#347)
	- curve.exchange(getTokenI(sellAddr),getTokenI(buyAddr),_sellAmt,_slippageAmt) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectCurveThreePool.sol#352)
	- setUint(setId,_buyAmt) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectCurveThreePool.sol#357)
		- MemoryInterface(getMemoryAddr()).setUint(setId,val) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectCurveThreePool.sol#56)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- LogSell(buyAddr,sellAddr,_buyAmt,_sellAmt,getId,setId) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectCurveThreePool.sol#359)
